offerAndAcceptance.offer: The Partnership, Parent, and ET entering into this Agreement.
offerAndAcceptance.acceptance: Mutual representations, warranties, covenants, and intentions to be legally bound.
offerAndAcceptance.meetingOfMinds: Parties acknowledge their understanding and agreement to the terms and conditions.

consideration.description: Mutual representations and warranties related to the Merger Agreement.
consideration.value: Not specifically quantified in the contract.

contract.intentionToCreateLegalRelations: Yes, the parties intend to create legal relations.
contract.legalityOfPurpose: This Agreement is lawful under Delaware law.

certaintyOfTerms.subjectMatter: Support Agreement related to the Merger.
certaintyOfTerms.timeForPerformance: Effective until the Support Agreement Termination Date.

contract.consent: All parties consent to the terms and conditions of the Agreement.

durationAndTermination.duration: Until the Support Agreement Termination Date which is April 22, 2025.
durationAndTermination.terminationConditions: Termination of the Merger Agreement or mutual written agreement.

contract.representationsAndWarranties: ET provides certain representations and warranties.

disputeResolution.details: Exclusively in the Delaware Court of Chancery.

governingLawAndJurisdiction.jurisdiction: Delaware Court of Chancery and state courts.

contract.severability: Invalid provisions will not affect the remaining Agreement.
contract.assignmentAndDelegation: Neither party can assign rights without consent.

signature.declaration: By: Riverwalk Logistics, L.P., its general partner
By: Sunoco GP LLC, its general partner
By: LE GP, LLC, its general partner
